Package org.colomoto.biolqm

Class StatefulLogicalModelImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.colomoto.biolqm.LogicalModelImpl
      • org.colomoto.biolqm.StatefulLogicalModelImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.colomoto.biolqm.LogicalModel, StatefulLogicalModel
    public class StatefulLogicalModelImpl
extends org.colomoto.biolqm.LogicalModelImpl
implements StatefulLogicalModel
    Extension of a logical model with the possibility to maintain a set of initial states and oracles.
    Implements the StatefulLogicalModel interface.
    Author:
    Rui Henriques
